snippet: The chief defense lawyer for the imprisoned opposition leader Yulia V. Tymoshenko was questioned on suspicion that he had beaten his former wife.
abstract: Prosecutors in Ukraine question the chief defense lawyer of Yulia V Tymoshenko, main political opposition figure, on suspicion that he beat his former wife; spokeswoman for Tymoshenko calls such questioning of Sergei Vlasenko absurd and another example of the government abusing its prosecutorial powers.
lead_paragraph: The chief defense lawyer for the imprisoned opposition leader Yulia V. Tymoshenko was questioned on suspicion that he had beaten his former wife.

headline.main: Lawyer for Ukraine Opposition Leader Is Questioned
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Lawyer For Opposition Is Questioned
